title: Comic Party Collection Complete English Subs
description:
Hi all,

This is Comic Party Collection English Subs

1. Comic Party

Overview:
Kazuki Sendo is in the third grade of high-school. However, he was relaxing every day because he had already obtained the college entrance permission. One day, he was tempted by Taishi to go to an on-the-spot sale of fanzine together. After that, he fell to the world of fanzine.

Link to AniDB:

This has dual audio Japanese and English subs by [LIME] 

Files in .mkv

2. Comic Party OVA

Overview:
A college student, SendÃƒâ€¦Ã‚ï¿½ Kazuki, happened to set foot in the doujinshi community. There, people are producing and selling doujinshi, which is the comic book drawn by fans rather than professional writers. At first he was reluctant, but as he met the girls earnest about producing doujinshi, he was gradually involved in creating it himself.

This series is based on a Dreamcast/PC game, "Comic Party", and its setting is different from the TV series. The main characters, Kazuki, Taishi, and Mizuki are college students whereas they were high school students in the TV series. The story starts after Kazuki has become acquainted with other characters.

3. Comic Party Revolution

Overview:
* Based on a game by AQUAPLUS
* The first 4 episodes are same as OVA

Sendo Kazuki, failed the entrance exam for the art college he was applying to, His childhood friend, Kuhonbutsu Taishi forced Kazuki to enter the doujin (private publishing) world.
